projects.title: Realtime Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- User Authorization.
 -  User Can create room to facilitating organized topic discussions.
 - real-time messaging for seamless and instant communication

projects.title: File Sharing App
projects.bodyText:
- Allow you to save file securely.
 - Share file to authorized user.
 - Manage permission. you can easily grant or revoke file access.

projects.title: Wheather App
projects.bodyText:
- This weather application is a CLI tool that uses a weather API to provide current weather conditions and forecasts.
 - Users can easily install the app, input their API key, and then check the current weather and upcoming forecasts for their desired locations.
